dmca.title: Copyright Infringments - DMCA Notice
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Jeff Davidson [mailto:info@cosmicfrogsphotography.com] 
Posted At: Friday, June 02, 2006 12:51 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Copyright Infringments - DMCA Notice
Subject: Copyright Infringments - DMCA Notice


June 2, 2006
 
Sender Information:
 
Jeff Davidson (dba: Cosmic Frogs Photography)
 
Sent by:  Jeff Davidson
 
8545 Kreiner Way
 
Santee, CA 92071, USA
 
Recipient Information:
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc., www.goldenlockss.com
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Dallas, TX 75207
United States
(214) 782-7802

 
Sent via email:
 
The following is a DMCA* notice.

 
We have discovered the unauthorized use of twenty (20) images, possibly
more, copyrighted by Jeff Davidson (dba: Cosmic Frogs Photography) on
your Goldies Sexy Avatars (http://www.goldenlockss.com
<blocked::http://www.goldenlockss.com>  )  web site.

The following images located at 
http://goldenlockss.com/avs/view_gallery.php?gallery=Gothic
 


   
And the following images located at 
http://goldenlockss.com/avs/view_gallery.php?gallery=tats 
<blocked::http://www.goldenlockss.com/150s/?CurrNum=125> 
    

And the following images located at 
http://www.goldenlockss.com/150s/?CurrNum=75
<blocked::http://www.goldenlockss.com/150s/?CurrNum=250>   
 
As well as full sized images at 
http://www.goldenlockss.com/images/?CurrNum=100
http://www.goldenlockss.com/images/aaagold-62.jpg  
http://www.goldenlockss.com/images/aaagold-63.jpg

These images were just on the first several pages of a couple of the
catagoreies listed on the site. I have so far documented 57 avatars
using my images and 6 full size images posted, who knows how many more
there could be!
 
The images displayed above, from your site, were deliberately cropped to
remove our copyright notice.
 
The above shown images were believed to be originally taken from my
online portfolio with One Model Place and/or Pbase.com.  As stated
previously, Our copyright notice has been removed from the images posted
on your site, which violates the copyright law.

Jeff Davidsons copyrighted works which have been infringed can be found
at http://www.onemodelplace.com/cosfrog
<http://www.onemodelplace.com/cosfrog>  and 
http://www.pbase.com/cosfrog/models
<http://www.pbase.com/cosfrog/models>   .
 
If you wish to examine such copyrighted works, you may do so by visiting
the above sites. Once you enter the site, simply scroll down the page
and find the images you see above and click on the image, all images
have our copyright notice in either the bottom left or right and corner
of the image.
 
I have a good faith belief that the use of the Jeff Davidson's
copyrighted material in the manner complained of in this email is not
authorized by the copyright holder Jeff Davidson, its agent, or the law.
The information in this notification is accurate. I swear under penalty
of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Jeff Davidson (dba:
Cosmic Frogs Photography) the owner of the exclusive rights in the
material which is being infringed. 

Jeff Davidson (dba: Cosmic Frogs Photography) is requiring the immediate
removal of each of the infringed images from your website.

Please contact me if you have any questions about this notice.


Jeff Davidson
Cosmic Frogs Photography <http://www.cosmicfrogsphotography.com/> 
Action and Portrait Photography
619-244-6841

 
 
------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------
* The Online Copyright Infringement Liability Limitation Act (OCILLA), a
portion of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act <
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_Millennium_Copyright_Act
<blocked::http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_Millennium_Copyright_Act>
> known as DMCA 512 or the DMCA takedown provisions, is a 1998 <
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1998
<blocked::http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1998> >  US <
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States
<blocked::http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States> > law that
provided a safe harbor to online service providers <
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_service_provider
<blocked::http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_service_provider> >
(OSPs, including ISPs <
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_service_provider
<blocked::http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_service_provider> > )
that promptly take down content if someone alleges it infringes their
copyrights. 
<http://www.onemodelplace.com/photographer_list.cfm?P_ID=77283>
